name: OtherLevels
tag_list: mobile, analytics, push, sms, email, marketing, tracking, data, smartphone, notifications
description: Measure and A/B test push, SMS and email
overview:
OtherLevels provides a SAAS platform for mobile marketers and publishers that allows them to measure and A/B test smartphone push messages, SMS and email campaigns in a single tool.

OtherLevels’ campaign-based analytics are quick to configure and compatible with popular platforms for delivering push, SMS and email. OtherLevels can track delivery, open rates, actions and resulting engagement.

OtherLevels provides automated A/B testing for push, SMS and email campaigns, allowing marketers to test alternative creatives over a certain volume of deliveries and automatically switch to the best-performing alternative at the end of the A/B test.
